title: Smart Data Models - ExcST7B
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE ST7B static excitation system without stator current limiter (SCL) and current compensator (DROOP) inputs.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcST7B

kh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. High-value gate feedback gain (Kh).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kia.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator integral gain (Kia).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Low-value gate feedback gain (Kl).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kpa.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator proportional gain (Kpa).  Typical Value = 40. Default: 0.0

oelin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. OEL input selector (OELin). Typical Value = noOELinput. Default: None

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator lag time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator lead time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback time constant of inner loop field voltage regulator (Tg).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tia.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback time constant (Tia).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

ts.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier firing time constant (Ts).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

uelin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL input selector (UELin). Typical Value = noUELinput. Default: None

vmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage reference signal (Vmax).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

vmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage reference signal (Vmin).  Typical Value = 0.9. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -4.5. Default: 0.0
